sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Add attendees New">b2f0efb82fd0011021e74ae72799b65b</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
	var name = source.u_name.toString();
	var split_names = name.split(' ');
	var num_names = split_names.length;
	if (num_names == 1){
		target.last_name = split_names[0];
	}
	if (num_names == 2){
		target.first_name = split_names[0];
		target.last_name = split_names[1];
	}
	if(num_names >= 3){
		target.first_name = split_names.shift();
		target.last_name = split_names.pop;
		var middle_name = split_names.join(' ');
	}
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-06 10:26:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf1a10c52f94011021e74ae72799b62c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kiran Marketing Event" source="x_724380_kiran_mar">ceba767c2f73301021e74ae72799b617</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kiran Marketing Event">ceba767c2f73301021e74ae72799b617</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_bf1a10c52f94011021e74ae72799b62c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-06 10:26:49</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
